game.description: Retrieve the legendary sword of the ancient warrior from the depths of the Dark Forest.
game.objective: Bring back the legendary sword and claim its power for yourself.

tasks.description: Venture into the Dark Forest and find the entrance to the ancient ruins.
Solve the puzzles and overcome obstacles within the ancient ruins.
Defeat the dark guardian and claim the legendary sword.

game.title: The Quest for the Sword of Light
